item.title: Annual Arch Summer Kick-Off Event Slated for May 20

item.title: Every Day Matters: Creating a Balance: Luca Osborne
item.description: The thing that struck Luca Osborne ’24 on his very first visit to RPI was the multidisciplinary approach to academics that seemed to permeate the entire campus. He couldn’t wait to use the studios and facilities available to students on campus, and he got started as soon as he arrived.
item.author: Community

item.title: Rensselaer Researcher Finds That Users Seek Out Echo Chambers on Social Media
item.description: We all know that communication encompasses so much more than words, but its various intricacies are often lost in social media, and until now, not much research has been done on social media communication in contrast to offline, traditional forms. In recently-published research, Boleslaw Szymansk and his team found that the dynamics, although similar, have different repercussions and contribute to the rise in polarizing viewpoints.

item.title: 124 Engineers Earn Spring Liberty League All-Academic Accolades
item.description: Late last week, it was announced that 124 Rensselaer student-athletes were named to the Liberty League’s All-Academic teams in their respective spring sports. In total, 1,113 student-athletes received All-Academic honors, marking the highest total for the spring season in the League’s 29-year history.
